softbanNintendo.title: Nintendo Softban â€“ Basic Info
softbanNintendo.bodyHtml:
Softban usually means you canâ€™t purchase in Argentina (or other regions) due to error code: 2813-2470.

Nintendo often blames the card provider / bank, but it doesnâ€™t fully make sense â€” the same card can work fine on a new account.

Why do I have softban if I bought before?

  • Softban seems random â€” it can happen anytime ğŸ˜… Buying successfully before doesnâ€™t guarantee it wonâ€™t happen later.
  • We donâ€™t know the exact cause, but we suspect IP/location mismatch (we may be wrong).

Will it disappear?

Yes, but timing is random. Weâ€™ve seen cases where it disappears after 3â€“7 days, and also a case where 6 months passed and it was still there.

Whatâ€™s the solution?

Wait, or make a new account / use another older one.
